songs.title: Gild (Sanctity Acoustic)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
My heart pulls towards you
My words burn my throat
“I’m so deprived, lover” I once wrote
I swallowed my silence, my head full of dreams I had of you
Don’t know what they mean
You’re listening but you will not see
You don’t understand what you mean to me
I want this to work
Carve our love into stone
I am with you but I’m always alone
